text: visvasa kalavuni! numbala allahta avanata vanu. emenma rasulvarayata da, balaya himi pradhaniyata da avanata vanu. namut yam karunaka numbala ekineka mata gÃ¦tum Ã¦ti karagatte nam, numbala allah ha paramanta dinaya visvasa karannan va sitiyehu nam, evita eya allah veta da rasulvaraya veta da yomu karanu. eya vada sresthaya. emenma (ehi) avasanaya da vada alamkaraya
